Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58

Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Lobby
    Handle the connections to the game, create the Rooms and start PreGame and Game, implements the Singleton Pattern.
    PreGameController
    This class handles the event and sets the information of the pregame phase of a game: the choice of the challenger, the placement of the workers, and choice of the first player.
    Room
    This class contains the Player and handle the game during the change of the phases.
    TurnController
    This class filters VirtualView events, it creates a turn(on model) for current player and manages it.
